items.content_html: cancelable-promise-jq is a lightweight library that helps you manage and organize asynchronous callbacks in your JavaScript code. It provides a simple interface for registering and triggering callbacks, as well as managing their execution order.
items.title: johnny-quesada-developer/cancelable-promise-jq: cancelable-promise-jq is a lightweight library that helps you manage and organize asynchronous callbacks in your JavaScript code. It provides a simple interface for registering and triggering callbacks, as well as managing their execution order.
